name: Star Drake
description: The Star Drake is a large dragon with a mix of physical power and magical abilities, exhibiting impressive speed on foot and in flight.
memorable: Its magical attacks and overwhelming effects can incapacitate foes, while its damage immunities make it a tough opponent.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate battles using its magical and physical prowess.
relations: Related to other dragons, often found in magical realms or celestial planes.
environment: Often found in magical landscapes or areas infused with celestial energy.
strengths: Immunities to cold, fire, and nonmagical damage; exceptional Wisdom granting high insight and perception.
attacks: The drake combines melee and ranged attacks, utilizing a powerful bite, claw strikes, and a formidable blast of radiant and force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Plane-Altered Breath, releasing a devastating breath attack that deals high force damage in a wide cone.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 22, giving it an extraordinary awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Arcana, History, Insight, Perception, and Religion, showing a range of knowledge.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Nimbus of Swirling Stars incapacitates creatures nearby at the start of its turn.
Planar Weapons ability enhances its weapon attacks with additional force damage.
Can teleport to different planes of existence with Planar Traveler.
Searing Star attacks can blind targets, reducing their effectiveness.
test_queries: dragon that can teleport between planes
creature with force damage breath attack
